description: This file contains code to set up and run a retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) agent using a PostgreSQL vector database with pgvector, including knowledge base creation, agent configuration, and a sample query.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the conversational agent that interacts with the knowledge base and language model.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI's embedding models.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Creates a knowledge base from PDFs accessible via URLs.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents the OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Implements a vector database interface using pgvector for PostgreSQL.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types in the vector database.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base into memory, optionally updating existing entries.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
